body.para: Modified files: . MOVED net Makefile net/remmina-applet Makefile distinfo pkg-descr pkg-plist Removed files: net/grdc-applet Makefile distinfo pkg-descr pkg-plist Log: - Update remmina-applet to 0.7.0 - Connect remmina-applet to the build - Disconnect grdc-applet - Remove grdc-applet, project was renamed
